connector.description:
Retrieve data from Splunk and outputs in json format.

For the fields accepting time specifiers like `earliestTime`, it accepts a wide variety of formats, please check https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/9.0.0/Search/Specifytimemodifiersinyoursearch[Splunk documentation] for more information.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverHostna.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverHostname
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverHostna.description: The address of your Splunk server. Example: my_server_splunk.com

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverPort.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverPort
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.serverPort.description: The address of your Splunk server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.username
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.username.description: The username to authenticate to Splunk Server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.password
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.password.description: The password to authenticate to Splunk Server.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.source.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.source
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.source.description: The source named field of the data.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.sourceType.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.sourceType
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.sourceType.description: The source named field of the data.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.connectionTi.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.connectionTimeout
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.connectionTi.description: Timeout in milliseconds when connecting to Splunk server

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.count.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.count
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.count.description: The maximum number of entities to return.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.delay
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll.

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.earliestTime.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.earliestTime
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.earliestTime.description: Earliest time of the search time window. Example: 05/17/22 08:35:46:456

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.initEarliest.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.initEarliestTime
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.initEarliest.description: Initial start offset of the first search. Example: 05/17/22 08:35:46:456

camel.kamelet.splunk-source.latestTime.name: camel.kamelet.splunk-source.latestTime
camel.kamelet.splunk-source.latestTime.description: Latest time of the search time window. Example: 05/17/22 08:35:46:456
